manifest.title: Directus
manifest.author: Directus Developers
manifest.description:
## About

Directus is an open-source tool that wraps your database with an API, and provides an intuitive admin app for
non-technical users to manage its content. It's what you'd get if you mixed a headless CMS, database client,
and WebApp builder. Created in 2004, our platform powers over a million data-driven projects around the world.

## What makes Directus so special?

* Freedom to Innovate
* All Platforms & Devices
* Free & Open-Source
* Pure SQL Content
* Whitelabel with your Brand

## Features

* Custom Workflows
* Form Layout
* Digital Asset Management
* Database Mirroring
* Multilingual Support

manifest.postInstallMessage:
This app is pre-setup with an admin account. The initial credentials are: **Email**: admin@example.com
**Password**: changeme
Cloudron users are given the default role of administrator. Set `AUTH_CLOUDRON_DEFAULT_ROLE_ID` to a custom role id in `/app/data/env.sh` to override this.
